title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Review updated
author: Amazon Customer
content: Updated: I have updated the review based on the fact that customer service reached out and sent a new speaker. I have received the new speaker and have tested it briefly, so far so good. I hope it holds up.We really wanted to love this speaker as we were using it for watching movies outside, however after a month or so, the speaker stopped being useful as it just drops the Bluetooth. We have tested the computer that we use with the older speaker we have, no issues. Than we connect this speaker and sure enough after 5-10min Bluetooth connection gets lost. With that said, when it worked, speaker was very clear and nice.. but now it‚Äôs useless. In other words, I would not recommend this speaker because it doesn‚Äôt last, and for its price, you should at least get 1 year of usage and not 1 month. Hope this helps others to not waste their money on this product.
timestamp: Reviewed in the United States August 24, 2023

title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Was Very Happy Until it Stopped Allowing Charging
author: Jim Johnson
content: I was pretty pleased with this little powerhouse at first. The sound is surprisingly good, and it's quite portable. The dual-bluetooth pairing is also interesting, though can sometimes result in unexpected hijacking of phone audio if someone unexpectedly turns it on and your phone is paired. All good though.Unfortunately, it started refusing to charge, only flashing a single white LED when plugged in. I've tried multiple chargers and nothing will take. It acts like it's charging, but even after 48 hours it still quickly gives a "busy signal" sound and powers itself off after you turn it on, which the internet tells me means the battery is too low.Fortunately the unit is somewhat reparable from what I've read. There are ifixit guides out there, and if you don't mind soldering you can relatively painlessly replace the battery. I might give that a try.
timestamp: Reviewed in the United States June 12, 2024

This speaker responds just as it should when changing songs and volume levels. The bluetooth range is very large also. We like that our phone doesn't have to be super close to work properly. In addition it has a very long battery life.It is an added bonus to have it water resistant, with a carry strap we use to secure it when needed. Overall, you cannot go wrong with the speaker.

title: 2.0 out of 5 stars When is it charged?
author: GK Beal
content: Great product but you never know when to charge it, when the chage will run out or when to stop charging it. This may not see like a big deal but why couldn't they give some kind of indication, it's the only device I have that doesn't tell me what the per centage charge is? They have four little lights that look like it would indicate how much charge it has but they are always on and so are just for show. Very frustrating. I have spoken to them about this with no solution.
